CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In an attempt to further improve the performance of the PCDTBT - based polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) , we have synthesized a selenophene analogue of PCDTBT , namely , PCDSeBT , in which diselenienylbenzothiadiazole ( DSeBT ) monomer alternately flanks with a 2,7-carbazole unit.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PSCs |
| PCDSeBT |
| diselenienylbenzothiadiazole ( DSeBT) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PSCs |
| PCDSeBT |
| diselenienylbenzothiadiazole (DSeBT) |

Note: "namely, PCDSeBT" and "in which diselenienylbenzothiadiazole (DSeBT) monomer alternately flanks" indicate that PCDSeBT is a specific type of PCDTBT with DSeBT as a component. Therefore, both PCDTBT and PCDSeBT are valid material names.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In an attempt to further improve the performance of the PCDTBT - based polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) , we have synthesized a selenophene analogue of PCDTBT , namely , PCDSeBT , in which diselenienylbenzothiadiazole ( DSeBT ) monomer alternately flanks with a 2,7-carbazole unit.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT-based polymer solar cells (PSCs) |
| PCDSeBT |
| diselenienylbenzothiadiazole (DSeBT) |
| monomer |
| 2,7-carbazole unit |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT-based polymer solar cells (PSCs) |
| PCDSeBT |
| diselenienylbenzothiadiazole (DSeBT) |
| monomer |
| 2,7-carbazole unit |
| selenophene analogue |
| alternately flanks |

Note: "In which" and "namely" do not refer to material properties, so they have been removed.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In an attempt to further improve the performance of the PCDTBT - based polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) , we have synthesized a selenophene analogue of PCDTBT , namely , PCDSeBT , in which diselenienylbenzothiadiazole ( DSeBT ) monomer alternately flanks with a 2,7-carbazole unit.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value            |
|-------------------------|
| PCDTBT-based polymer solar cells (PSCs) |
| PCDSeBT                 |
| diselenienylbenzothiadiazole (DSeBT) monomer |
| 2,7-carbazole unit       |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value            |
|-------------------------|
| PCDSeBT                 |
| diselenienylbenzothiadiazole (DSeBT) monomer |
| 2,7-carbazole unit       |

Explanation:

* "PCDTBT-based polymer solar cells (PSCs)" is a type of solar cell, not a material property.
* "In an attempt to further improve the performance" and "we have synthesized" are actions and not properties.
* "Further improve the performance" is a goal, not a property.
* "Namely" is a word that indicates a change in name, not a property.
* "Selenophene analogue" is a description of PCDSeBT, not a property.
* "Alternately flanks" is an action, not a property.
* "With a 2,7-carbazole unit" is a description of the structure of PCDSeBT, not a property.
